title: Australia makes aircraft
creator_credit: Richard Mitchell, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: The Department of Supply is the centre of the Australian aircraft industry. Film shows the manufacture of military aircraft in Australia. Includes production and assembly of a Mirage supersonic fighter and its Atar engine and shows briefly the design, testing and maintenance facilities of the department.
